comments.body: You mentioned handling this manually until the client is ready for luci testing. It looks like in post-submit on luci this comparison is a no-op: https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/0be9127dfd934b8fe4bb363ea47d895d1e9830f9/packages/flutter_goldens/lib/flutter_goldens.dart#L489
Yep. I can definitely follow up with that based on the discussion on #49749.
Ok. Is this an already existing test? If so, idk if changing it to a no-op test in the interim is a good idea.
